1cd1e622-12bb-4b35-a2c9-63ff7bda6c73.description: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.
1cd1e622-12bb-4b35-a2c9-63ff7bda6c73.title: Far far away, behind the word mountains

DLXCBFkoAqdD4lNAJpRxsxd9wAC2.description: Adjusting quiver and bow, Zompyc[1] killed the fox. My faxed joke won a pager in the cable TV quiz show. Amazingly few discotheques provide jukeboxes. My girl wove six dozen plaid jackets before she quit. Six big devils from Japan quickly forgot how to waltz.
DLXCBFkoAqdD4lNAJpRxsxd9wAC2.title: The quick, brown fox jumps over a lazy dog

My girl wove six dozen plaid jackets before she quit. Six big devils from Japan quickly forgot how to waltz.
DLXCBFkoAqdD4lNAJpRxsxd9wAC2.title: Big July earthquakes confound zany experimental vow
